Text:
you know you're addicted to a TV series when....

a: you watch ep1 of season 2 and have to go back and download all of Season one and watch all 22eps in 3 days.. just to catch up..

b: you download each new ep in both HDTV and WEB just to keep the better quality one cause you know you're gonna watch the whole two seasons again.

c: you can't wait till your partner goes to work to watch them again on the HD tv cause he happens to hate them.

d: all of the above
